name: Media Crowd
overview:
Founded in 2010 by a group of Internet marketing professionals, Media Crowd is an advertising agency, which specializes in performance-based marketing. Media Crowd’s founders saw a lack of accountability and results in the performance marketing space and decided to fill this need for clients. Media Crowd maintains expertise across all branches of Internet marketing. We have worked with businesses of all sizes to help maximize their presence while maintaining a high return on investment.

Headquartered in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, Media Crowd’s clientele spans across the globe. Corporations such as Direct TV, Groupon, Dish Network, CreditReport.com, and Match.com have used Media Crowd to improve their company’s reach.

Our Mission:

Provide our clients with the highest quality service. Develop results driven Internet marketing solution for our clients. Add real and measurable value to our clients businesses. Support and give back to the community.

Our Principals:

Integrity: Our relationship with our clients, vendors, and employees are built on a trust and a commitment to honesty. Quality: We demand superior quality for our clients; we are not in the business of delivering “good enough” results. Speed: We operate on a sense of urgency when dealing with all clients while maintaining upmost quality. Results: We are 100% results driven agency and are dedicated to providing the best possible return on investment for our clients. Teamwork: We communicate openly with one another and maintain a high level of collaboration on every project.
